Posts.Content: May 21, 2007 02:17AM seasun wrote: Paula - thanks for pic record of hair growth. I am at week 10 after last chemo and my hair growth is about right on with what yours was. Mine is also coming in black with specs of grey. In couple of months - blondie here I come again - thanks.

Posts.Content: May 21, 2007 02:21AM seasun wrote: Nadola - are you from Ontario, Can.? Reason I ask is that it seems so many have 3 FEC and then 3 Taxotere. I am stage 3B and was so sick for 5/10 days after each FEC. Taxotere was bad but FEC was worse. I can only speak for myself and my own SE though. Six weeks of radiation after was nothing compared to the FEC. Now, 2 weeks after last Rad's skin is healing and fatigue is getting less and less.
Posts.Title: Anyone having FEC? ducky1 SKD

Posts.Content: Jan 7, 2007 02:45AM seasun wrote: I am from the Nov/06 group. Just dropping in to say "have strength". No one told us this will be an "easy go". But I have just had my 4th treatment (3 of FEC and one of Taxotere). But I know the drugs are working even though for the first 7-10 days afterwards they make one sick. Hang in and the folks at this website offer so much information not found anywhere else. Good luck to all - Valerie
